thread.title: Great boutique hotel with excellent staff
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel with excellent staff - Review of Hotel Fabric, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: marcuselliottbrown
title: Great boutique hotel with excellent staff
text: I have stayed here twice and both times were great. The rooms are well designed as are the common area. Breakfast is well done with good choice. Housekeeping do a great job - cleanliness is critical for me and the team does a great job.
